fields.Title: Trant Heidelstam: ""Well... He doesn't have visible tr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well... He doesn't have visible tremors. He talks without slurring. He can drive a boat. He's standing, reasoning. All good signs. But -- complete retrograde amnesia, episodic *and* semantic..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way, it was real. I've even..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, it was real. I've even put it in my report -- you should read it. I do not, however, think it has anything to do with him drinking himself to the point of brain damage."

fields.Title: Jean Vicquemare: "He turns back to you. "I keep my sh..."
